title: China's Unisplendour to invest $3.78 bln in Western Digital
content:
Sept 30 (Reuters) - U.S. data storage company Western  Digital Corp said it would get a $3.78 billion equity  investment from Chinese information technology company  Unisplendour Corp Ltd. 
 
The company said on Wednesday it would issue new shares to  Unisplendour at $92.50 each. 
 
The Chinese company will hold about 15 percent of Western  Digital's issued and outstanding shares after the investment. 

(Reporting by Ankit Ajmera in Bengaluru; Editing by Kirti  Pandey)
